peradiga ganitha ilakkam wala aagamanayath samanga ethek nisi sammathayak nomathiwa awul wu nul bolayak men akramawathwa walbihiwi thibu batahira ganithaya nawina widyawa bihiwimata sudusu margayata piwisuni.peradiga ganitha ilakkam nolabuni nam aaloka warshayaka diga pramanaya ilakkamen kolayaka liya gatha nohakiwa batahira ratawal loku amaruwaka watenu nisakaya.peradiga ilakkam samanga pamini shunyaya hewath binduwa peradigin batahirata nolabennata ada nawina widyawa kiya deyak nothibennatath ida thibuni.(yam ayaku meya piliganimata akamathinam rene deikarts wisin shunyaya padaka wu khandanka akshaya haraha khandanka jyamithiya bihi kala ayuruth ema khandanka jyamithiya anuwa yamin ayisak niwitan kalanaye ha anukalanaye jyamithika wiwaranaya sidukala ayuruth wilhelm layibinits shunyaya aadharayen wruddhiya,simawa haraha kalanaya ha anukalanaye wija ganithamaya wiwaranaya kala ayuruth,parighanakaya padaka wana 0,1 tharkikaya ganath soya balanna.sitha balanna.

mage palamu satahane ma awasana washayen ma “kurutu ga gi pawura“ yanuwen biththi puwathpathak daka athayi yanuwen satahan kale obala wisin swayanwa mema nama nirmanaya kalawuwada (samaharawita wenath thanakin laba gaththa wiya hakiya - eya waradak nowe) mita pera mama ema nama daka athayi satahan kirimataya.obala mama moda tharka karanawayayi pawasuye mewani karunu walataya.awasana washayen mata illimata aththe obala bolog ekak patan gaththe kumana aramuninda e් aramunin katayuthu karagena yana lesaya.

lokaye athi kuda wuwada aarthika washayen shakthimath ratawal samanga suhadathawa goda naga gath me nayakaya merata sanwardhana katayuthu shakthimath karalimata owunge sahaya laba gaththe thama rajya thanthrika gnyaanaya upayogi kara ganimini.duppath ratak sanwardhanaya kara gena yamedi widesha aayojanayanhi awashyathawa therum gath ohu, merata widesha aayojakayanta ida salasana ladde rate garuthwayata haniyak nowana paridiya.mahinda rajapakshayan jathyanthara prashna waladi thama rate sthawaraya idiripath kirimedi anugamanaya kala madhyastha niwaradi prathipaththiya loka rajya nayakayinge pasasumata lak wiya.ohuge manawa hithawadi bawa lowa siyalu janawargayakatama samanathmathawa lokaya hamuwe thabimata pasu bata nowiya.thama deshapalana washayen muhukura yanawath samangama ohu thamatama aawenika deshapalana darshanayak matha kriya kaleya.
